1790-1800 athara kalayedi amarika eksath janapadaye janadhipathi lesin palanaya meheyawu jorj woshintan janadhipathiwaraya filadelfiya nagaraye sita palanaya meheyawu athara mema nagaraya thawakalika aganuwara bawata path wiya. 1790 wasare jorj woshintan janadhipathiwaraya mema janapathi mandiraya wenuwen ardha kawakara godanagillak ek karana lada athara janadhipathiwaraya mema mandiraye wishesha kamarayaka pihiti janela thunakin epita sita mahajanathawa amathana ladi. 1797 wasare balayata path jon ...

sunil daya alwisawurudu 30 k thisse pawathi thrasthawadi yuddhaya awasan kota shri lankawe labagath jayagrahanaye athdakima da inpasuwa shri lankawa aarthika washayen nangi sitimata aarambha kota athi sanwardhana kriyadamayan pilibanda lowata saba thaththwaya penwimata labena hondama awasthawak lesa shri lankawe pawathwana podu rajya mandaliya parlimenthu sangamaye 58 wani maha samuluwa handunwa diya haki baw rajaye prakashakayaku sandahan kale ya.me maha samuluwa labana angaharuwada (11) mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma athin nelum pokuna mahinda rajapaksha rangahaledi perawaru 9.30 ta wiwrutha wanu atha.mema sasiwaraya aarambhaya ikuth 7 wanida sanituhan kele podu rajya mandaliya parlimenthu sangamaye rajyayan 54 kata ayath parlimenthuwala kathanayakawarun ha parlimenthu manthriwarun paminimath samanga ya.‚Äúanagathaya udesa arthanwitha podu rajya mandalayak goda nangamu‚Äù yanna mewara pawathwena samuluwe pradhana themawaya.me samuluwata podu rajya mandaliya sangamaye parlimenthu sangamaye maha lekam kamalesh sharma mahatha da sahabhagi wimata niyamitha ya.
